tuv.seg: Account no longer exists. Recreate it?
Le kemb'i'aj man k'o ta chik. ¿Kawinaqirisaj?
Account notifications will now also be sent to %(secondaryEmailVerified)s.
Ub'ixikil rech kemb'i'aj xuquje' ktaq na b'ik chech %(secondaryEmailVerified)s.
Complete set-up by entering the new password on your other Firefox devices.
Chatz'aqatisaj ujeqik ruk' uch'apik k'ak' retokib'al pa le jun chi wiqkemchakub'al rech Firefox.
Once you're finished, use your new password to sign in on all of your devices.
Are taq chk'is awumal, chakojo' le k'ak' aretokib'al chech umajixik kemchak a ronojel taq awiqkemchakub'al.
Password reset successfully. Sign in to continue.
Utz xub'an k'ak' uwokik retokib'al. Chamajij kemchak chech ub'anik na.
Thank you for reaching out to Mozilla Support about %(escapedLowercaseTopic)s for %(escapedSelectedProduct)s. We'll contact you via email as soon as possible.
Tyox chi awech chech ach'awem ruk' Toq'ab'al rech Mozilla chi rij %(escapedLowercaseTopic)s chech %(escapedSelectedProduct)s. kqataq jun taqoqxa'nib'al awuk' aninaq aq'anoq.
Thank you for reaching out to Mozilla Support about %(escapedLowercaseTopic)s. We'll contact you via email as soon as possible.
Tyox chi awech chech ach'awem ruk' Toq'ab'al rech Mozilla chi rij %(escapedLowercaseTopic)s. Kqataq jun taqoqxa'nib'al awuk' aninaq aq'anoq.
Kemb'i'aj man eta'matal taj. Utz'ib'axik ib'
You are now ready to make changes to your Firefox Account.
La jamal awach chech ub'anik taq k'exonem chanim chech le akemb'i'aj rech Firefox.
You are now ready to use %(serviceName)s
5 ub'ixikil chi rij taq ilawachib'a retokib'al
Chaya' jun k'ak' kemriqonib'al rech taqoqxa'nib'al
Taq ajch'ab'e'n rech le uwujil taq kemriqonib'al
Cholpaqal taq tzukunem pa taq retztaqan rech nab'alil.
{ $affectedEmail } appeared in this breach. What to do next
{ $affectedEmail } xk'utun pa we jun retztaqan. Jas kb'anik
After reviewing the details about a breach and taking steps to protect your personal info, you can mark breaches as resolved.
Are taq chilitaj taq ucholajil chi rij le retztaqan chi'l ub'anik taq ucholajil chech uchajixik ¶ le awinaqilal q'alajisanem, utz kakoj retal taq retztaqan pacha' solom.
Chana'b'aj chi wech chi rij k'ak' taq retztaqan
All { -brand-name } products honor our Personal Data Promise: Take less. Keep it safe. No secrets.
Ronojel taq k'ayij rech { -brand-name } kkib'an le qatzujum chi rij winaqilal q'alajisanem: xa nitz' kab'ano, chaya' pa chajib'al, man k'o ta owatalik.
All known breaches have been marked as resolved
Ronojel taq retztaqan le man eta'matal taj kojom retal pacha' solom
Taq wiqkemchakub'al jeqetal pa taq kojkemchak
A strong password uses a combination of upper and lowercase letters, special characters, and numbers. It doesn’t contain personal info like your address, birthday, or family names.

Jun kowilal retokib'al kukoj jun xolanem rech nim tz'ib' chi'l nitz' tz'ib', nim ucholajil taq tz'ib', ¶ chi'l taq ajilab'al. Man ruk'a'am ta winaqilal q'alaljisanem pacha' ¶ le akemriqonib'al, ralaxb'al, chi'l kib'i' taq ajupaja.
Avoid using personal info in passwords
Makoj winaqilal q'alajisanem pa taq retokib'al

A website data breach happens when cyber criminals steal, copy, or expose personal information from online accounts. It’s usually a result of hackers finding a weak spot in the website’s security. Breaches can also happen when account information gets leaked by accident.

Kxajtaj jun retztaqan rech juq'attzij rech uk'olib'al web' are taq le ekemelaq'omab' ke'elaq'anik, on kkelesaj uwach on kkiya' winaqilal q'alajisanem pa taq kemb'i'aj rech nimk'atz, Are wa' jun uwachinem kech taq e b'ank'ax are taq kkiriq jun uk'olib'al web' le man k'o ta uchuq'ab'. Le taq retztaqan xuquje' kxajtajik are taq kq'alajisax le q'alajisanem le man chub'anik taj.
Rajilab'alil taq kemb'i'aj rech ja k'olpwaq
{ -brand-fpn } throws off the websites and data collectors that profile you with ads by masking your real IP address.
{ -brand-fpn } Kuchup taq uk'olib'al web' chi'l taq mulib'al juq'attzij le katuk'utu ruk' taq kemtzijob'elil le kuch'uq le qas akemriqonib'al IP.
{ -brand-name } browser not required for a { -brand-fxa }. You may receive info about { -brand-Mozilla } services.
{ -brand-name } man rajawaxik ta le nik'onel chech jun { -brand-fxa }. Wene' kak'ulaj q'alajisanem chi rij { -brand-Mozilla } taq pataninem.
{ -brand-name } is tech that fights for your online privacy.
{ -brand-name } are k'ak' eta'mab'al le kukoj uchuq'ab' chech le echeb'alil rech nimk'atz.
Taq juq'attzij rech retztaqan ya'om rumal { $hibp-link }
Bring { -brand-name } to your phone and tablet
Chak'ama' { -brand-name } pa le ach'aweb'al chi'l pa le t'in kemahib'il
Chak'exa' le aretok'ib'al rech we uk'olib'al web'
Change your password to a strong, unique password.
Chak'exa' le ataqoqxa'nib'al pa jun kowilal utukelal retokib'al.
Taq kemb'i'aj k'o retztaqan chi rij:
Taq juq'attzij k'o retztaqan chi rij:
Could not add email address to database.
Man xkowinb'ex ta uya'ik le kemriqonib'al pa mulib'al juq'attzij
Man xkowinb'ex ta uya'ik uchuq'ab' taq retztaqan.
Create a { -brand-fxa } for your full report of breaches and to get alerts.
Chawinaqirisaj jun { -brand-fxa } chech le tz'aqat wokb'ixikil rech taq retztaqan chi'l uriqik taq na'b'anem.
Create a { -brand-fxa } to monitor your email for ongoing breaches. Once you’ve verified your email, you’ll also receive a full report of past breaches, including sensitive breaches.

Chawinaqirisaj jun { -brand-fxa } chech rilawachixik le ataqoqxa'nib'al chech utzukuxik taq retztaqan. ¶ Are taq kq'atutaj le ataqoqxa'nib'al, xuquje' kak'ulaj jun tz'aqat woktzijob'al rech taq retztaqan kanoq, ¶ rachi'l taq retztaqan rech na'b'alil.
Create unique passwords and save them somewhere safe, like a password manager.
Chawinaqirisaj jalan taq retokib'al ch'l chak'olo' apawije' chajib'al, pacha' ilawachib'al retokib'al.
Hash rech alaj k'olib'al rech t'inpwaq
Cyber criminals could find your password on the dark web and use it to log in to your other accounts. The best way to protect your accounts is to use unique passwords for each one.
Le e kemelaq'omab' wene kkiriq le aretokib'al pa le uq'eqal web' chech ukojik ¶ chech okem a nik'aj chi taq kemb'i'aj ¶ are ukoik utukelal taq retokib'al chi jujunal.
Taq retztaqan rech ya'l taq juq'attzij

Data aggregators, or data brokers, collect information from public records and buy it from other companies. They compile this data to sell it to companies for marketing purposes. Victims of these breaches are less likely to experience financial fraud, but hackers could use this data to impersonate or profile them.

Le taq ya'l juq'attzij o taq mulinel taq juq'attzij, kkimuluj q'alajisanem kech uk'iyal ¶ taq cholajib'al chi'l kkiloq chi kech e nik'aj chi k'aywokaj, kkimulij we taq juq'attzij k'ate k'u ri' kkik'ayij chi kech e nik'aj chi k'aywokaj ¶ chech ub'anik taq k'ayinem. Le taq e riqol uk'axal rech taq we retztaqan man qas ta e k'o pa uk'eyowal chech uriqik uk'axal rech pwaqilal.¶ sub'unem, xa k'ut le taq b'ank'ax wene kkikoj we juq'attzij chech kijalwachixik.
Data breaches are on the rise. If your personal info appears in a new data breach, { -product-name } sends you an alert — so you can take action and protect your accounts.

Le taq retztaqan rech taq juq'attzij ktajin ke'enimarik. We kq'alajin le awinaqilal q'alajisanem pa jun k'ak' retztaqan rech taq juq'attzij, ¶ { -product-name } kutaq jun na'tajisab'al chi awech — are chi utz kachajij le akemb'i'aj.
Taq juq'attzij rech uterne'xik ukojik wiqkemchakub'al
kemriqonib'al rech taq taqoqxa'nib'al ktajin kq'atuxik
Email me if one of my email addresses below appears in a data breach.
Chataqa' jun nutaqoqxa'nib'al chi wech we k'o jun chi kech taq nukemriqonib'al rech taqoqxa'nib'al chi uxe' kk'utun pa jun retztaqan rech juq'attzij.
Enroll multiple emails in breach monitoring
Chatz'ib'aj k'i taqoqxa'nib'al pa le rilawachixik retztaqan
Even for old accounts, it’s important to update your password.
Pine' ajer taq kemb'i'aj, rajawaxik kak'ak'arisaj aretokib'al.
Fast, private, and safe browsing everywhere you go. Find { -brand-name } in the Google Play and App Store.
Aninaq, echeb'alil, chi'l chajital nik'onel apawije' katb'e wi. Chariqa' { -brand-name } pa le Google Play chi'l pa App Store.
Find out about new data breaches
Chariq'a' nik'aj chik chi rij taq retztaqan rech juq'attzij
Find out how to mitigate the risks of identity theft to prevent financial loss.
Chaweta'maj jas kb'an chech uq'atexik relaq'axik winaqilal chech uq'atexik relaq'axik me'rkortil.
Find out if your data was exposed in this breach.
Chawila' we xk'oji' le ajuq'attzij pa uk'axk'olil pa we retztaqan.
Find out if you’ve been part of a data breach
Chawila' we k'o retztaqan b'anom chech ajuq'attzij
Find out if you’ve been part of a data breach with { -product-name }. Sign up for alerts about future breaches and get tips to keep your accounts safe.

Chawila' we k'o taq retztaqan b'anom chi awech rech taq juq'attzij ruk' { -product-name }. Chatz'ib'aj awib' chech uk'ulaxik chi rij taq retztaqan aq'anoq chi'l chariqa' taq no'jib'al chech uchajixik taq akemb'i'aj.
Find out what hackers already know about you. Learn how to stay a step ahead of them.
Chariqa' jachike e b'ank'ax keta'am chi awach, Chaweta'maj jas kab'ano are chi katnab'ej jun ucholajil chi kiwach.
Find out what you need to do to keep your data safe from cyber criminals.
Che'ariqa' jas kab'ano chech uchajixik taq juq'attzij chech uq'atexik taq kemelaq'omab'.
Get help creating better passwords and keeping them safe.
Chariqa' tob'anem chech uwinaqirisaxik utzalaj taq retokib'al chi'l kichajixik.
Get help remembering all your passwords and keeping them safe.
Chariqa' tob'anik ruk' unatajisaxik ronojel taq aretokib'al chi'l che'achajij.
Chak'ulaj taq ub'ixikil pa le nik'onel
Get notified the next time your personal info gets exposed in a known breach.
Chariqa' ub'ixikil pa le jumul chik kk'oji' le awinaqilal q'alajisanem pa jun eta'matal retztaqan
Amaq'el chak'ulaj taq na'b'anem ruk' jun { -brand-fxa }.
Get ongoing breach monitoring for multiple email addresses.
Chariqa' junelik rilawachixik taq retztaqan chech uk'iyal taq kemriqonib'al rech taqoqxa'nib'al
Utz katb'e pa k'olwokaj rech rilawachixik

Hackers may try to use that same password and your email to get in to other accounts. Create a different and unique password for every account, especially for your bank account, email, and other websites where you save personal information.

Le e b'ank'ax wene kkikoj le junam retokib'al chi'l le ataqoqxa'nib'al chech okem pa nik'aj chi kemb'i'aj. ¶ Chawinaqirisaj jun jalan chi'l utukelal retokib'al chech jujun taq kemb'i'aj, qas na chech le akemb'i'aj rech ja k'olpwaq, ¶ Taqoqxa'nib'al, chi'l nik'aj chi uk'olib'al web' jawi' kk'ol wi winaqilal q'alajisanem.
Have your online accounts been exposed in a data breach?
¡Wene e ya'om taq akemb'i'aj pa nimk'atz pa jun retztaqan rech juq'attzij?
Jas kub'an { -product-name } chech taq wokk'olib'al rech na'b'alil
How do I know this is a legitimate email from { -product-name }?
¿Jas kinb'an chech reta'maxik we tzij rech { -product-name } we taqoqxa'nib'al?
However, it did appear in { $breachCount } other breaches.
Xa k'ut man xq'alajin ta pa { $breachCount } jun chi retztaqan.
However, it did appear in { $breachCount } other known breaches.
Xa k'ut, xk'utun pa { $breachCount } nik'aj chi eta'matal taq retztaqan.
Jas uchupik utz'ib'axik ib' pa taq na'b'anem { -product-name }
I don’t recognize this company or website. Why am I in this breach?
Man weta'am ta uwach we k'aywokaj on uk'olib'al web'. Jasche ink'o pa we jun retztaqan?

If you can’t log in, contact the website to ask how to update it. See an account you don’t recognize? Your data could have been sold or redistributed. This could also be an account you forgot you created or a company that changed names.

We man ktkowin taj kamajij kemchak, chach'ab'ej le uk'olib'al web' kata chech jas kab'an chech uk'ak'arisaxik. ¶ ¿kawil jun kemb'i'aj le man aweta'am ta uwach? Wene xa xe'ek'ayix b'i le taq ajuq'attzij ¶ on jachatal chi jumul. Wa' xuquje' wene jun kemb'i'aj le xasacho ¶ xawinaqirisaj on wene xa xuk'ex ub'i' jun k'aywokaj.
If your information surfaces in a new data breach, we’ll send you an alert.
We kq'alajin le aq'alajisanem pa jun k'ak' retztaqan, kqataq b'i na'b'anem chi awech.
If you use { -brand-name }, you’ll receive a notification if you visit a site that’s been breached. Find out right away if you were part of that breach and what you can do about it.

We kakoj{ -brand-name }, kariq na jun ub'ixikil we kasolij jun ¶ jun wokk'olib'al web' le b'anom retztaqan chech. chawila' we chi'l at b'anom we retztaqan chi awech... chi'l jas rajawaxik kab'an chech.
Is your new password unique, strong, and hard to guess? Find out
Le ak'ak' retokib'al la jalanik, k'o uchuq'ab' chi'l la k'ax uch'akik? Chariqa'
It can sometimes take months or years for credentials exposed in a data breach to appear on the dark web. Breaches get added to our database as soon as they have been discovered and verified.

K'or kuk'am jampa' ik' on jampa junab' are chi kk'utuk uk'axk'olil rech q'alajisab'al ¶ pa jun retztaqan rech uq'eqal web'. Le taq retztaqan aninaqil ke'eya' pa le mulib'al juq'attzij ¶ are taq ke'eriqitajik chi'l ke'eq'atutajik.
It’s easy to find birthdays, addresses, and family member names online. Keep these words out of your passwords.
Man k'ax ta uriqik taq ralaxb'al, taq kemriqonib'al chi'l taq kib'i' ajupaja pa nimk'atz, makoj wa' taq tzij pa taq aretokib'al.
Keep track of your logins across all devices. Access them securely from your computer, phone, or tablet.
Chacholajij taq umajixik kemchak pa ronojel taq awiqkemchakub'al. Chatokoq pa chajital okem pa le akematz'ib', ch'aweb'al on alaj t'inkemachib'il.
Keep up the momentum. Check your dashboard to see if there’s more to do.
Chak'olo' le na'tab'al. chawila' le ak'olwokaj rech rilawachixik chech rilik we k'o na nik'aj chik kb'anik.
Known data breaches have exposed your info
Le taq retztaqan rech juq'attzij le eta'matalik uya'om le aq'alajisanem pa uk'axk'olil
Known data breaches marked as resolved
eta'matal retztaqan rech taq juq'attzij kojom retal pacha' solom
Learn how to avoid bad password habits that make a hacker’s work easy.
Chaweta'maj uq'atexik taq retokib'al le man k'o ta uchuq'ab' le kub'ano' chi man k'ax ta uriqik chi kech le e b'ank'ax.
Lock down your accounts to keep your information out of the wrong hands.
Chaq'atej taq akemb'i'aj chech uchajixik le aq'alajisanem.
Make the new password different and unique
Chab'ana' chech le aretokib'al chi jalan ub'antajik chi'l utukelal
Make your passwords strong, secure, and hard to guess.
Chab'ana' kowilal chech le aretokib'al, chajitalik, chi'l k'ax uriqik.
Chawilawachij ronojel taq kemriqonib'al rech taqoqxa'nib'al pa { $preferencesLink }.
Chakojo' retal we retztaqan pacha' solom
Mask your location from websites and trackers
Chawowaj le ak'olib'al pa taq uk'olib'al web' chi'l taq terenelab'
Nik'aj chi q'alajisanem chi rij we retztaqan

Most breaches only expose emails and passwords, but some do include sensitive financial information. If your bank account or credit card numbers were exposed, alert your bank to possible fraud. Monitor statements for charges you don’t recognize.

Nima ronojel taq retztaqan xew kkib'an k'ax chech taq taqoqxa'nib'al chi'l taq retokib'al, xa k'ut k'o jujun ruk'a'am nim ucholajil q'alajisanem rech pwaqilal. ¶ We kachomaj k'o k'axk'olil chi rij le akemb'i'aj rech ja k'olwaq, on le rajilab'alil uwujil qajanik, chaya' ub'ixik chech le a ja k'olpwaq chi wene k'o k'axk'olil chi rij. ¶ Che'aq'atuj we kojom kumal nik'aj chik winaq.
Most people have about 100 online accounts. Have any of yours been exposed in a data breach? Find out.
Nima konojel winaq k'o 100 kikemb'i'aj pa nimk'atz. Wene k'o jun awech b'anom retztaqan chech? chawila'.
New in { -product-name }: Mark breaches as resolved
At k'ak' pa { -product-name }: chakojo' retal taq retztaqan pacha' solom
Nice! You’ve just resolved your first breach.
Utz, solotaj le nab'e retztaqan awumal.
No other breaches found from a basic search.
Man xriqitaj ta nik'aj chi taq retztaqan pa jun tzukunem qas eta'matalik.
{ $numAffectedEmails } of your email addresses appeared in this breach. What to do next
{ $numResolvedBreaches } out of { $numTotalBreaches } breaches marked as resolved
taq retztaqan kojom retal pacha' solom
On { $breachDate }, { $breachTitle } was breached. Once the breach was discovered and verified, it was added to our database on { $addedDate }.
Pa { $breachDate }. { $breachTitle } xb'an retztaqan. Are taq xriqitaj le retztaqan chi'l xq'atutajik. xya'taj pa le mulib'al juq'attzij pa { $addedDate }.
Password managers like 1Password, LastPass, Dashlane, and Bitwarden store your passwords and fill them in to websites for you. They’ll even help you make strong passwords.

Taq ilawachinelab' rech taq retokib'al pacha' 1Password, LastPass, Dashlane, chi'l Bitwarden kkik'ol taq ¶Taq retokib'al chi'l unojisaxik pa taq uk'olib'al web', xuquje' katkito' chech utzukuxik chajital taq retokib'al.

Password managers like 1Password, LastPass, Dashlane, and Bitwarden store your passwords securely and fill them into websites for you. Use a password manager on your phone and computer so you don’t have to remember them all.

Le ilawachinelab' rech taq retokib'al pacha' 1Retokib'al, LastPass, Dashlane, chi'l Bitwarden utz uk'olik taq ¶ aretokib'al kkib'ano chi'l kkiya' pa taq uk'olib'al web'. Chakojo' jun ilawachinel rech taq retokib'al ¶ pa le ach'aweb'al chi'l pa akematz'ib' are chi man rajawaxik taj ronojel kana'taj chi awech
taq retokib'al k'o pa uk'axk'olil pa ronojel taq retztaqan
Taq retokib'al k'o pa uk'axk'olil pa taq retztaqan le man solom taj
{ -product-name } found your email in a new data breach
{ -product-name } chariqa' ataqoqxa'nib'al pa jun k'ak' retztaqan rech juq'attzij

{ -product-name } only reveals accounts associated with these types of breaches after an email address has been verified. This means you’re the only person who can see if your information was in this breach (unless someone else has access to your email account).

{ -product-name } xew kuk'ut kemb'i'aj le uximom rib' ruk' ¶ uwach taq retztaqan are taq kq'atutaj kemriqonib'al rech taqoqxa'nib'al. Are wa' kub'ij xew at ¶ katkowinik kawilo we xk'oji' le aq'alajisanem pa retztaqan (xew we k'o alachinaq ¶ le k'o rokem pa le akemb'i'aj rech taqoqxa'nib'al).

{ -product-name } warns if your online accounts were involved in a data breach. Find out if you’ve been in a data breach, get alerts about new breaches, and take steps to protect your online accounts. { -product-name } is provided by { -brand-Mozilla }.

{ -product-name } kuya' ub'ixik we xe'ek'oji' taq akemb'i'aj pa nimk'atz pa jun ¶ retztaqan. Chawila' we atk'olinaq pa jun retztaqan, chariqa' taq na'b'anem chi rij taq k'ak' retztaqanj, ¶ chi'l chab'ana' taq ucholajil chech uchajixik taq akemb'i'aj pa nimk'atz. { -product-name } ya'tal ¶ rumal. { -brand-Mozilla }.

{ -product-name } warns you if your email address has been exposed in an online data breach. See if your information has been exposed, learn how to better protect your online accounts, and get alerted if your email address appears in a new breach.

{ -product-name } kuya' ub'ixik chi awech we xk'oji' le akemriqonib'al rech taqoqxa'nib'al pa uk'axk'olil ¶ pa jun retztaqan pa nimk'atz. Chawila' we xk'oji' le aq'alajisam pa jun uk'axk'olil, chaweta'maj jas ¶ kb'an chech utz uchajixik le taq akemb'i'aj pa nimk'atz, chi'l chariqa' na'tajisanem we kk'utun le akemriqonib'al ¶ rech taqoqxa'nib'al pa jun k'ak' retztaqan.
Protect your life online with privacy-first products
Chachajij le ak'aslemal pa nimk'atz ruk' taq nab'e k'ayij rech echeb'alil.
Protect your passwords from cyber criminals, since that’s what they care about most.
Chachajij le aretokib'al chi kiwach kemelaq'omab', rumal are la' qas kkaj.
Chasik'ij uwach nik'aj chi taq no'jib'al rech chajinem
Chataqa' chi jumul le q'atub'al taqoqxa'nib'al
Chattzalija pa taq cholajil rech retztaqan
Search all your email addresses for breaches and get alerts about new threats.
Che'atzukuj pa ronojel taq akemriqonib'al rech taqoqxa'nib'al we k'o retztaqan chi'l che'ariqa' taq na'b'anem chi rij taq k'axk'olil.
Search for your email address in public data breaches going back to 2007.
Chatzukuj le akemriqonib'al rech taqoqxaibnib'al rech pa taq retztaqan rech juq'attzij kech uk'iyal ruk' tzalijem pa 2007.
Search for your email address in public data breaches going back to 2007. This basic search will surface most data breaches, but not ones that contain sensitive personal information.

Chatzukuj taq kemriqonib'al rech taqoqx'anib'al pa taq retztaqan rech juq'attzij le e petinaq ¶ pa ri 2007 loq . We tzukunem qas kkojik kuk'ut nima ronojel taq retztaqan xa k'ut man kuk'ut ta ¶ le kuk'a'am taq juq'attzij rech na'b'alil.
Security tips to protect your accounts
Taq no'jinem chech uchajixik taq akemb'i'aj
Security tips to protect yourself from hackers
Taq no'jib'al rech chajinem chech achajixik chi kiwach e b'ank'ax

Chawila' we chi'l at ariqom jun retztaqan rech juq'attzij pa nimk'atz
See if you were in this breach
Chawila' we xatk'oji' na pa we retztaqan
Select your browser’s back button, reload the page, and try again.
Chacha' le pitz'b'al rech tzalijem rech le anik'onel, chak'ak'arisaj le uxaq wuj, k'ate k'u ri' chab'ana' chi jumul.
Send breach alerts to the affected email address
Chataqa' taq nab'anem rech retztaqan pa le kemriqonib'al rech taqoqxa'nib'al le uriqom k'ax
Na'b'alil retztaqan rech taq uk'olib'al web'
Short, single-word passwords are easy for hackers to guess. Use at least two words and a combination of letters, digits, and special characters.
Le taq nitz' retokib'al le xa jun tukelal tzij man k'ax ta uriqik chi kech e b'ank'ax.
Show all breaches for this email.
Chak'utu' ronojel taq retztaqan rech we taqoqxa'nib'al.
Chatz'ib'aj awib' pa jun rilawachixik retztaqan
Sign up for breach monitoring with a { -brand-fxa }.
Chatz'ib'aj awib' pa rilawachixik taq retztaqan ruk' { -brand-fxa }.
Sorry, that breach is not in our database.
Chakuyu', le retztaqan man k'o ta pa le mulib'al juq'attzij.
Almost done! You’re close to the finish line.
Xpe rutzirik Atk'o chi chi unaqaj le nab'e juch'.
Feels good, right? If you want to keep going, this is a good time to update other logins with stronger passwords.
utz una'ik, tzij?We kawaj kab'an na, wa' jun utz uq'ijol ¶ chak'ak'arisaj nik'aj chi okem ruk' taq retokib'al qas k'o uchuq'ab'.
Keep it up! Small changes like updating passwords have a big impact on keeping your personal info safe.
¡chawila'!nitz'aq taq k'exonem pacha' uk'ak'arisaxik taq retokib'al sib'alaj nim kub'an pa ¶ uchajixik le awinaqilal q'alajisanem.
Nice work resolving those breaches! Keep it up. You’ve got a few more to go.
Utz chak xab'ano chech usolik taq retztaqanjela' kab'an chech. K'o na nik'aj chik kab'ano.
Once you’ve taken the steps you can to address this breach, you can mark it as resolved. You can still access details about the breach from your dashboard at any time.
Are taq xb'antaj we ta ucholajil chech rilik uta'ik we retztaqan,¶ Utz kakoj retal pacha solom. Utz na, katok pa taq ucholajil chi rij le retztaqan ¶ pa le k'olwokaj rech rilawachixik xaq jampa'.
You’re off to a great start! Check out the remaining breaches to learn what steps to take.
silab'alaj utz umajixik ab'anomchawila' taq retztaqam k'a maja na chawila' jachike kraj na chech reta'maxik ¶ jachike taq ucholajil kab'ano.
Chatatab'ej we k'o nik'aj chi taq retztaqan
Stay safe: Get email alerts when your info appears in a known breach
Chachajij awib': Chariqa' taq taqoqxa'nib'al rech na'b'anem are taq kq'alajin le aq'alajisanem pa jun eta'matal retztaqan
Taq ucholajil rech usolik we retztaqan
Steps to take to protect your online identity
Taq ucholajil rech uchajixik le awinaqilal pa nimk'atz
Chaq'atab'a ukojik chi jumul taq retokib'al le akojom chik
Stop using that exposed password entirely.
Makoj chi le jun retokib'al le k'o pa uk'axal.
Stop using the exposed password, and change it everywhere you’ve used it.
Makoj chi le retokib'al k'o k'axk'olil chi rij, chak'exa' pa ronojel jawi' akojom wi.
Nim uchuq'ab' taq retokib'al = Utzalaj chajinem
Take action to protect your accounts
Chab'ana' jachike rajawaxik chech uchajixik taq kemb'i'aj
Take back control of your personal data.
Take further steps to protect your identity
Chab'ana' we taq ucholajil rech uchajixik le awinaqilal
There is a way to protect your privacy. Join { -brand-name }.
K'o jun ub'e'al chech uchajixik le acheb'alil. Chat'iqa' awib' { -brand-name }.
The strength of your passwords directly impacts your online security.
We qas nim ucholajil aretokib'al sib'alaj nim uchajixik le chajib'al pa nimk'atz kub'ano.
This breach has been marked as resolved
We retztaqan kojom retal pacha' solom
This email address is not subscribed to { -product-name }.
We kemriqonib'al man tz'ib'am ta pa { -product-name }
This email appeared in { $breachCount } known data breaches.
We taqoqxa'nib'al xk'utun pa { $breachCount } eta'matal retztaqan rech juq'attzij.
This email appeared in the { $breachName } breach.
This email did not appear in the { $breachName } breach.
We taqoqxa'nib'al man xq'alajin ta pa le { $breachName } retztaqan.
This email has already been added to { -product-name }.
This will remove your email from the { -product-name-nowrap } list and you will no longer receive alerts when new breaches are announced.
Wa' kuchup le taqoqxa'n pa ucholajil { -product-name-nowrap } mak'u kak'ulaj ta chi taq na'b'anem are taq kq'alajisax k'ak' taq retztaqan.
Though passwords weren’t exposed in this breach, there are still steps you can take to better protect your personal info.
Pine man xe'ek'oji' ta taq retokib'al pa uk'axk'olil pa we retztaqan, k'a k'o na taq ucholajil le utz kab'ano chech qas utz uchajixik le awinaqilal q'alajisanem.
To finish verifying this email for { -product-name }, you must be signed in under your primary account email.
Chech uk'isik uq'atuxik we taqoqxa'n chech { -product-name }, rajawaxik kamajij kemchak pa le taqoqxa'nib'al pa le uk'u'x akemb'i'aj.
To see all remaining breaches, go to your dashboard.
Chech rilik ronojel taq retztaqan kraj na, utz katb'e pa le ak'olwokaj rech rilawachixik.
To see and manage all emails you’ve signed up for breach monitoring, { $nestedSignInLink }.
Chech rilik chi'l rilawachixik ronojel taq taqoqxa'b'al atz'ib'am awib' pa rilawachixik retztaqan, { $nestedSignInLink }.
Turn off { -product-name } alerts. Your { -brand-fxa } will remain active, and you may receive other account-related communications.
Che'achupu' taq na'b'anem { -product-name }. Le { -brand-fxa }awech ktziji' na, xuquje' wene kya' jun chi kemb'i'aj chi awech le kjunamataj ruk' taq tzijonem.
Understand the most common threats and know what to look out for.
Chak'oxomaj le uk'axal qas kb'anik chi'l chaweta'maj jas katzukuj.
Unlike a website breach, there’s no password to change.
Le uk'exb'alil jun retztaqan rech uk'olib'al web', man k'o taq retokib'al kk'exik.
Kajawataj un token chech uchupik utz'ib'axik ib'.
Unsubscribing requires a token and emailHash.
Kajawataj jun token chech uchupik utz'ib'axik ib' chi'l emailHash.
Use a password manager to create strong, unique passwords. Password managers securely store all your logins so you can access them across all your devices.

Chakojo' jun ilawachinel retokib'al chech uwinaqirisaxik ukowilal, utukelal retokib'al. Le Ilawachinelab' rech retokib'al kkik'ol pa chajinem ronojel taq ¶ umajixik taq kemchak pa ronojel taq awiqkemchakub'al.
Verify the link sent to { $userEmail } to add it to { -product-name }.
Chaq'atuj le kemwiqb'al taqom pa { $userEmail }chech uya'ik pa { -product-name }.
Visit your { $preferencesLink } to check the status of { $userEmail }.
Chasolij le { $preferencesLink } chech uq'atuxik le kemub'antajik rech { $userEmail }.
Was your info exposed in the { $breachName } data breach?
¿La xk'oji' le aq'alajisanem pa uk'axk'olil pa le { $breachName } retztaqan rech juq'attzij?
We’ll alert you if { $email } appears in a data breach.
Kqaya' nab'anem chi awech we { $email }kk'utun pa jun retztaqan rech juq'attzij.
We recommend you take these steps to keep your personal info safe and protect your digital identity.
We’re worried you might be a bot because you searched several email addresses in a short time period. For now, you’re blocked from new searches. You can try again later.
Wene xa at bot rumal xatzukuj ¶ k'iyalaj kemriqonib'al reh taqoqxa'nib'al pa re jutz'it. Chech we chanim, atq'atem ¶ chech ub'anik nik'aj chi taq tzukunem, Utz kab'an chi pa jutz'it.
¿Jas uwach ri' jun retztaqan rech uk'olib'al web'?
What to do after a data aggregator breach:
Jas kb'anik are taq xb'antaj jun retztaqan chech le ya'l juq'attzij:
What to do after a data breach
Jas kab'ano are taq kxajtaj jun retztaqan rech juq'attzij
What to do after a website breach:
Jas kb'anik are taq xb'antaj jun retztaqan chech jun wokk'olib'al web':
What to do for this breach
What to do to protect your personal info
Jan kb'an chech uchajixik le awinaqilal q'alaljisanem
Why did it take so long to notify me of this breach?
¿Jas che sib'alaj knajtin ub'ixikil chi wech pa jun retztqan?
Why did it take so long to report this breach?
You are monitoring the maximum number of email addresses.
Ktajin kawilawachij le nimalaj rajilab'alil kemriqonib'al rech taqoqxa'n.
You can’t stop hackers from hacking. But you can avoid bad habits that make their work easy.
Man katkowin taj ke'aq'atej le e b'ank'ax chech ub'anik uk'axk'olil. Xa k'ut utz kaq'atej taq b'anoj le man utz taj chi'l le ktob'anik are chi man k'ax ta ub'anik le kichak.
You’ll need to unsubscribe from one of the emails { -product-name } sent.
Rajawaxik kachup utz'ib'axik awib' pa jun chi kech taq taqoqxa'nib'al { -product-name } taqom.
You’ll need to unsubscribe from one of the emails { -product-name } sent you. Check your inbox for messages from { -brand-team-email }. Select the unsubscribe link at the bottom of the email.

Rajawaxik kachup utz'ib'axik ib' pa jun chi kech ¶ taq taqoqxa'nib'al { -product-name } taqom chi awech. Chaq'atuj le k'oltaqoqxa'nib'al rech taq oqxa'n pa ¶ { -brand-team-email }. Chacha' le kemwiqb'al rech uchupik utz'ib'axik ib' chi uxe' le taqoqxa'nib'al.
You must be signed in to your { -brand-fxa }.
You’re signed up to receive { -product-name } alerts when your email appears in a data breach. Here’s what we know about this breach.
Attz'ib'am are chi kopan taq na'b'anem awuk' { -product-name } ¶ aretaq kk'utun le ataqoqxa'nib'al pa jun retztaqan rech juq'attzij. Waral k'o wi jachike le qeta'am chi rij we retztaqan.
You’re taking important steps towards protecting your online accounts.
Ktajin kab'an nim ub'antajik taq cholajil chech uchajixik taq akemb'i'aj pa nimk'atz.
Your information was discovered in a new data breach.
Xriqitaj le aq'alajisanem pa jun k'ak' retztaqan rech juq'attzij.
Your right to be safe from hackers starts here.
Le ya'tal chi awech are chi k'o achajinem kumajij waral.
You tried to scan too many email addresses in a short time period. For security reasons, we’ve temporarily blocked you from new searches. You’ll be able to try again later.
Ktajin kaq'axwachirisaj sib'alaj k'i taqoqxa'nib'al pa jun nitz' ramaj. Rumal taq chajinem atqaq'atem chech k'ak' taq tzukunem. Chab 'ana' chi jumul pa jutz'it.
%1$s also uses blocklists provided by Disconnect, Inc. as separate and independent works under the GNU General Public License v3, and available here.
%1$s xuquje' kukoj taq ucholajil q'ateb'al ya'om rumal Disconnect, Inc. pacha' tastalik chi'l utukelal taq chak chi uxe' le GNU Uwujil kech uk'iyal v3, chi'l k'olik waral.
%1$s is free and open source software made by Mozilla and other contributors.
%1$s are jun cholwach le man k'o ta jaqatal retokib'al winaqirisam rumal Mozilla chi'l nik'aj chi tob'anelab'.
%1$s is made available to you under the terms of the Mozilla Public License and other open source licenses.
%1$s b'anom chi k'o chi awech at are tzij taq taqanem rech le Kemwujil rech Mozilla rech uk'iyal chi'l nik'aj chi jaqatal uxe'al taq kemwujil.
Add and manage custom autocomplete URLs.
Chaya' chi'l chawilawachij winaqirisam utz'aqatisaxik pa utukelam URLs.
+ Chaya' jun chi ch'ich' rech tzukub'al
Additional source code for %1$s is available under various other free and open source licenses.
Utz'aqatil uxe'al retokib'al chech %1$s k'o chi uxe' pa k'i nik'aj chi jaqatal sipatal taq uxe'al taq kemwujil.
Add shortcuts to your home screen
Chaya' taq ramb'al b'e pa le umajib'al q'axwach
An installed search engine is already using that name.
Jun jeqeb'am ch'ich' rech tzukub'al ktajin chi kukoj la' le b'i'aj.
Automatic private browsing. Browse. Erase. Repeat.
Nik'onem rech echeb'alil pa utukelam. Utzukuxik. Uyujik. Ukamulixik.
Chaq'atej taq k'oxomab'al rech taq tzukub'al
Chaq'atej nik'aj chi taq tzukub'al upam chak

Chaq'atuj chi le cholaj tzij rech tzukunem kjunamataj ruk' le k'amwach rech k'utub'al
Cookies chi'l taq juq'attzij rech wokk'olib'al web'
Man kriqitaj ta pa uxaq wuj
Kamul chaq'atuj le URL le xatz'ib'aj.
Downloaded files will not be deleted when you erase %1$s history.
Taq kemk'olib'al qasam man kchupisax taj are taq kachup %1$s b'antal kanoq.
Embedded on sites to track your visits and to display functionality like share buttons
Wiqital pa taq wokk'olib'al web' chech uterene'xik taq solinem chi'l chech uk'utunsaxik taq chakunem pacha' taq pitz'b'al rech ukomone'xik
Enable to have %1$s autocomplete over 450 popular URLs in the address bar.
Chatzija' chech uriqik %1$s utz'aqatisaxik pa utukelam kq'ax pa uwi' 450 qas eta'matal URLs pa le uq'e'tb'al kemriqonib'al.
Enabling may cause some pages to behave unexpectedly
Le utzijik wene kub'ano chi jujun taq uxaq wuj man eye'tal ta le kkib'ano
Chayuju' le b'anatal kanoq rech nik'onem
Find an app that can open link
Chariqa' jun kemwiqb'al le kkowinik kujaq kemwiqb'al
Rowaxik taq uxaq web' are taq kk'ex taq kojkemchak
Hide webpages when switching apps and block taking screenshots.
Rowaxik taq uxaq web' are taq kk'ex taq kojkemchak.
Chab'ana' jun amaq'el ub'anik chech le echeb'alil
May result in missing icons or images
Wene kub'ano chi ke'etzaq taq retno'jib'al on taq wachib'al
Mozilla strives to collect only what we need to provide and improve %1$s for everyone.
Le Mozilla kukoj uchuq'ab' chech umulixik xew le rajawaxik kya'ik chi'l uk'exsuk'umaxik %1$s chi kech konojel.
None of the apps on your device are able to open this link. You can leave %1$s to search %2$s for an app that can.
Man k'o ta jun chi kech taq kojkemchak pa le awiqkemchakub'al kkowinik kujaq we kemwiqb'al, utz kaya' kan %1$s chech utzukuxik %2$s jun kojkemchak le kkowinik.
Notifications let you erase your %1$s session with a tap. You don’t need to open the app or see what’s running in your browser.
Le taq Ub'ixikil kuya' b'e kachup le %1$s kemchak ruk' jun pitz'onik. Man rajawaxik taj kajaq le kojkemchak on kawilo jas ktajin kub'an le anik'onel.
Chajaqa' kemwiqb'al pa jun chi kojkemchak
Chajaqa' kemwiqb'al pa jun k'ak' k'utjaqb'al

%1$s puts you in control.

Use it as a private browser:

  • Search and browse right in the app
  • Block trackers (or update settings to allow trackers)
  • Erase to delete cookies as well as search and browsing history

%1$s is produced by Mozilla. Our mission is to foster a healthy, open Internet.
Learn more

%1$s kuya' rilawachixik chi awech.

Chakojo' pacha' nik'ob'al rech echeb'alil:

  • Chatzukuj chi'l chanik'oj pa le kojkemchak:
  • Che'aq'atej taq tzukub'al (on chak'ak'arisaj taq wiqitajem chech uya'ik b'e chi kech taq tzukub'al)
  • Chayuju' chech kichupik cookies chi'l utzukuxik chi'l unik'oxik b'antal kanoq

%1$s are b'anowinaq le Mozilla. Le qachak are uya'ik jun utzalaj, ujaqik kemk'atz.
Chaweta'maj nik'aj chik
Pages may load faster, but may also behave unexpectedly
Le taq uxaq wuj wene aninaq uya'ik uchuq'ab' , xa kut wene man eye'tal ta le kkib'ano
K'axk'olil rech uya'ik uchuq'ab' uxaq wuj
Uya'ik chi jumul uchuq'ab' wokk'olib'al web'
Ub'ixikil rech k'axk'olil rech wokk'olib'al web'
Tz'onoj rech wokk'olib'al web' rech ilwach chak
Utzalijisaxik taq ch'ich' rech tzukunem ya'om chi uloq
Return to your favorite sites in %1$s quickly. Just select "Add to Home screen" from the %1$s menu.
Chattzalija pa taq ajawatal taq wokk'olib'al web' pa %1$s aninaq. Xew chacha' "Uya'ik pa umajib'al q'axwach" pa le %1$s cholokib'al.
Saved and shared images will not be deleted when you erase %1$s history.
Chak'olo' chi'l chakomone'j taq wachib'al man kchupixax taj are taq kachupu %1$s b'antal kanoq.
Searching for something different? Choose another default search engine in Settings.
¿Ktajin katzukuj jalan taq jastaq? Chacha' jun chi chi'ch' rech tzukunem ya'om chi uloq pa taq suk'manem.
Man utz ta xub'an le chajital t'iqonem
Set %1$s as your default browser and get the benefits of private browsing when you open webpages from other apps.
Chaya' %1$s pacha' anik'onel ya'om chi uloq chi'l chariqa' le tob'anem rech nik'onem rech echeb'alil are taq kajaq taq uxaq web' pa nik'aj chi taq kojkemchak.
Uya'ik pa ya'om chi uloq, utz'aqatisaxik pa utukelam
Shortcut will open with Tracking Protection disabled
Le suk'um okib'al kjaqataj ruk' Chajinem rech chupum tzukub'al
Some ads track site visits, even if you don’t click the ads
Jujun taq ukemtzijob'exik kkiterene'j rij taq solinem pa taq wokk'olib'al web', pine' man kapitz' ta pa taq ukemtzijob'exik
Take private browsing to the next level. Block ads and other content that can track you across sites and bog down page load times.

Chak'ama' b'i le nik'ob'al rech echeb'alil pa le jun chi cholajil. Che'aq'atej taq ukemtzijob'exik chi'l jun chi upam chak le kkowinik ktzukun pa taq kemk'olib'al web' chi'l kuq'atej taq ukanil uya'ik uchuq'ab' uxaq wuj.
Le uxaq wuj man utz ta ub'e'ik ktajin kub'ano
Tzukunem, cookies, jalajoj ucha'ik rech taq juq'attzij

• Check the address for typing errors such as ww.example.com instead of www.example.com
  • If you are unable to load any pages, check your device’s data or Wi-Fi connection.

• Chaq'atuj le kemriqonib'al ruk' utz'ib'axik taq k'axk'olil pacha' ww.example.com chi uwach www.example.com
  • We man katkowin taj kaya' uchuq'ab' apachike uxaq wuj, chaq'atuj le juq'attzij rech awiqkemchakub'al on t'iqonem rech.

• The site could be temporarily unavailable or too busy. Try again in a few moments.
  • If you are unable to load any pages, check your mobile device’s data or Wi-Fi connection.

• Le wokk'olib'al web' wene man jamal ta uwach on sib'alaj latz' uwach. Chab'ana' chi jumul pa jutz'it.
  • We man katkowin taj kaya' uchuq'ab' apachike taq uxaq wuj, chaq'atuj le ujuq'attzij taq awiqkemchakub'al on ut'iqonem Wi-Fi .

• This could be a problem with the server’s configuration, or it could be someone trying to impersonate the server.
  • If you have connected to this server successfully in the past, the error may be temporary, and you can try again later.

• Wa' wene kuya' k'eyowal ruk' le suk'manem rech kempatanel, on wene are jun le kraj kukoj rib' chi kempatane.l
  • We utz ub'anom le at'iqonem ruk' we kempatanel le ub'anom kanoq, le k'axk'olil wene xa ch'ikital uq'ijol, chi'l utz kanb'an chi jumul pa jutz'it.
• This problem can sometimes be caused by disabling or refusing to accept cookies.
• We k'eyowal k'or are kya'ow le uchupik on le man kajawataj ta uk'amik cookies.

• Web addresses are usually written like http://www.example.com/
  • Make sure that you’re using forward slashes (i.e. /).

• Le taq kemriqonib'al rech taq Web' nima amaq'el tz'ib'atal pacha' http://www.example.com/
  • Qas chawila' chi ktajin kakoj q'e'l jeqk'utb'al (i.e. /).
• You might need to install other software to open this address.
Used to collect, analyze and measure activities like tapping and scrolling
Kkoj chech umulixik, uk'oxomaxik, chi'l retaxik taq b'anowem pacha' tz'ib'anem chi'l silob'em
We can’t load this page for some reason.
Jas na k'u che man kojkowin taj kqaya' uchuq'ab' we uxaq wuj.

Man kaya' ta chi awech taq ya'talil chi'l taq uwujil etal rech k'ayinem rech Mozilla Foundation on ni jun chi kech taq utz'aqatil, rachi'l le Mozilla, Firefox on %1$s taq b'i'aj on taq retwokaj. Le utz'aqatil q'alajisanem wene kriqitaj waral.
You can leave %1$s to open this link in %2$s.
Utz kaya' kan %1$s chech ujaqik we kemwiqb'al pa %2$s.
Your browsing history has been erased.
Le atzukub'al rech b'anatal kanoq xchupisaxik.
Copy the link to open in another browser
Chawelesaj uwach le kemwiqb'al chech ujaqik jun chi nik'onel

Chawinaqirisaj uwach le kemwiqb'al chech ukomone'xik le akemk'olib'al:

Chawinaqirisaj jun { -firefox } kemb'i'aj on chamajij kemchak

Man utz ta le retokib'al. Chab'ana' chi jumul.

Chatzija' taq kemwiqb'al are chi kq'ax pa uwi' { $count } taq q'ij
Chaweta'maj chi rij jun chi { -mozilla } taq patanib'al
Manage shared files from any device
Chawilawachij komone'tal taq kemk'olib'al pa apachike wiqkemchakub'al
Xew { $count } taq kemk'olib'al ya'om b'e chech
Only { $count } files can be uploaded at a time.
Xew { $count } taq kemk'olib'al kkowinb'ex upaqab'isaxik pa jun uq'ijol.
or click to send up to { $size }
Please enable JavaScript and try again.
Chatzija' JavaScript k'ate k'u ri' chab'ana' chi jumul.
{ -send-brand } lets you share files with end-to-end encryption and a link that automatically expires. So you can keep what you share private and make sure your stuff doesn’t stay online forever.

{ -send-brand } kuya' bé chi awech kakomonej taq kemk'olib'al ruk' wiqitajem chi'l jun kemwiqb'al le kq'ax uq'ijol pa utukelam. Are chi man katzaq ta le kakomone'j pa echeb'alil chi'l chasuk'ub'a' rilik chi le taq ajastaq man kk'oji' ta pa nimk'atz pa junelik.
{ -send-brand } will not work with this browser. { -send-short-brand } works best with the latest version of { -firefox }, and will work with the current version of most browsers.

{ -send-brand } man kchakun ta ruk' we nik'onel. { -send-short-brand } are qas utz uchakunem ruk' le maja naj okib'al rech { -firefox }, xuquje' kchakun ruk' le okib'al rech chanim rech nima ronojel taq nik'onelab'.
{ -send-short-brand } is brought to you by the all-new { -firefox }.
{ -send-short-brand } k'amom la chi awech rumal le k'ak' { -firefox }.
Chakomone'j taq kemk'olib'al kq'ax pa uwi' { $size }
Chakomone'j taq kemk'olib'al kuk' nik'aj chi winaq
Share the link to your file:
Chakomone'j le kemwiqb'al chech le akemk'olib'al:
Sign in to send up to { $size }
Man k'ax taj, ukomonexik taq kemk'olib'al pa echeb'alil
That file is too big to upload. It should be less than { $size }
Le kemk'olib'al sib'alaj nim chech upaqab'isaxik. Rajawaxik nitz' chi uwach{ $size }
There is a way to protect your privacy. Join Firefox.
K'o jun ub'e'al chech uchajixik le a'echeb'alil. Chat'iqa' awib' pa. Firefox.
This browser might not be able to decrypt a file this big.
We nik'onel wene man kkowin taj kusol jun jewa' unimal kemk'olib'al
This file was shared via { -send-brand } with end-to-end encryption and a link that automatically expires.
We kemk'olib'al xkomone'x pa { -send-brand } ruk' wiqitajem pa xkut chi xkut chi'l jun kemwiqb'al le kq'ax uq'ijol pa utukelam.
This password could not be set
Man kkowimb'ex ta ujeqeb'axik le retokib'al
Try { -send-brand } for simple, safe file sharing.
Chak'amb'ejaj { -send-brand } chech man k'ax taj, ukomonexik kemk'olib'al pa chajib'al.
Unfortunately this version of Firefox does not support the web technology that powers Firefox Send. You’ll need to update your browser.
Chakuyu' we okib'al rech Firefox man kutoq'aj ta le k'ak'eta'm rech web' le kuya' uchuq'ab' Firefox Send. Rajawaxik kak'ak'arisaj le anik'onel.
Why does Firefox Send require JavaScript?
Why is my browser not supported?
Your file is encrypted and ready to send
Le akemk'olib'al wiqitalik chi'l utz chi kataqo
